-- | Hack2 Snap server handler

@package hack2-handler-snap-server
@version 2015.3.9

module Hack2.Handler.SnapServer
run :: Application -> IO ()
runWithConfig :: ServerConfig -> Application -> IO ()
runWithSnapServerConfig :: Config Snap a -> Application -> IO ()
data ServerConfig
ServerConfig :: Int -> ServerConfig
port :: ServerConfig -> Int
hackAppToSnap :: Application -> Snap ()
instance Show ServerConfig
instance Eq ServerConfig
instance Default ServerConfig
